summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll or Local Improvement District No. 6057 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 41, Gilman's Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue West and 13th Avenue West from Ruffner Street to West Bertona Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82808, as amended by Ordinance No. 82896 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
